✅ What You Do

  1. Copy this content into a new Notion page
      • Name it: Contact ZenTrust
  1. Click “Share” → toggle Share to Web ON
  1. Paste the public link here 🧘🏽‍♂️
  1. I’ll extract the page ID and connect /contact in your site code, just like we did for /about and /vision
Let’s complete the holy trinity 🛖💌🌍
